item.title: Taking Azure Firewall IDPS on a Test Drive
item.description:
Written by Gopikrishna Kannan (Head of Products: Azure Firewall and Firewall Manager)
Intrusion detection and prevention (IDPS) is an advanced threat prevention mechanism supported by the Azure Firewall Premium SKU. Unlike simple network filtering, IDPS matches traffic patterns to a set of known malicious signatures. Azure Firewall supports more than 60,000 malicious signatures which are updated in real time.
